document_data.name: Bralzaer Windriver
document_data.mainbody: Bralzaer Windriver was the youngest son of [[Sabrast Windriver]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Per his father, [[Sabrast Windriver]], Bralzaer had founded a mercenary company out of [[Sembia]] named [[Bralzaer's Bold Basilisks]].
document_data.Relationships: In a revel on {{yearlink|1356}},{{cite book/Elminster in Hell/Hardcover 2001|2|Realmslore}} Sabrast Windriver explained he wasn't sending his youngest son any money.
